title: needhu mahima
sahitya:
nIdu mahima pogaDa nA taramA rAmA nitya sukhadA



anupallavi



 mOda hrdaya sAmavEda rUpamaya nAdasvarUpA nannAdarincumika



caraNam



 kSIra shayana harikEsha hrtsadanA bhUbhAramu tIrcuTa kOru dEvatulaku ghOra

 rAvaNa samhAramu cEyuTa shrI raghukulamunan-dhIramugA puTTina
